data.question: What is the chemical formula of the first organic-based magnet reported?
What is the ferrimagnetic ordering temperature of [V(TCNE)x]·z CH2Cl2?
What synthesis method was used to prepare solvent-free thin films of [V(TCNE)x]?
What are the magnetic ordering temperatures for [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 and [Mn(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2, respectively?
data.answer: 100 K for [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 and 75 K for [Mn(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2.

data.question: What is the space group of the cross-linked layered structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
What is the observed Fe-N-C angle in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
What technique was used to determine the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: Rietveld refinement of synchrotron powder diffraction data.

data.question: How does the presence of [C4(CN)8]2- affect the saturation magnetization of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: It decreases the number of antiferromagnetically coupled [TCNE]C- species, leading to a higher observed Ms value.

data.question: What structural feature contributes to the magnetic ordering as a ferrimagnet at 100 K in [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: The dominant spin exchange within the layers.

data.question: What is the role of m4-[C4(CN)8]2- ligands in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2?
data.answer: They interconnect the {FeII(TCNE)C-} layers and contribute to the canting of the FeN6 octahedra.

data.question: What does the presence of two different forms of reduced TCNE in the [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 structure imply about its IR spectrum?
data.answer: It results in nCN absorptions at 2221 and 2172 cm-1, indicating structural disorder.

data.question: How does the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 compare to that of room-temperature [V(TCNE)x]-based magnets?
data.answer: The [V(TCNE)x]-based magnets likely have VII ions bridged by m4-[TCNE]C- ligands within a layer, unlike [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 which is interconnected by m4-[C4(CN)8]2-.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 involves the reaction of TCNE with FeI2.
True or False: The structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 includes single crystals of the brown compounds.
True or False: The Fe-N-C angle in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 is exactly 180 degrees.
True or False: The magnetic ordering temperature of [Mn(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 is higher than that of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2.
True or False: The [C4(CN)8]2- moieties in the structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 are ordered.
True or False: The observed Ms value for [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 at 2 K and 9 T is lower than expected for a spin-only S = 2 FeII center antiferromagnetically coupled to two S = 1/2 [TCNE]C- ions.
True or False: The structure of [Fe(TCNE)2]·z CH2Cl2 suggests that [V(TCNE)x] is amorphous with a local structural order prone to defects.
